summary:
Adds a dunmer merchant who happens to be selling some of what may be the last Telvanni Bug Musk, among other Morrowind classics.

*Requires Dragonborn*
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i899.photobucket.com/albums/ac192/AqPlanted/telvmusk-1.png[/IMG]

==================
[color=#beb887]Description:[/color]
==================

Adds a dunmer merchant who happens to be selling some of what may be the last Telvanni Bug Musk, along with some other Morrowind classics. He is located near Tel Mithryn - see the screenshot for a better idea of where he resides (he is where the blue player marker is in my screenshot).

Telvanni Bug Musk allows you to haggle for 35% better prices and increases speechcraft by 20 for a duration of 90 seconds. It also comes in a pretty bottle.

v1.1 adds Vintage Flin, Vintage Greef, and Vintage Matze. See pictures for attributes of each potion (note: the drain magicka effect on Matze lasts for 90 seconds even though it doesn\'t state such in the potion\'s description).

*Requires Dragonborn*


==================
[color=#beb887]Incompatible:[/color]
==================

May be incompatible with mods that modify the same area where the merchant\'s camp is.


==================
[color=#beb887]Changelog:[/color]
==================

10/22/2013 - 1.2 - Lowered the price of the new potions
2/15/2013 - v1.1.3 - Telvanni Bug Musk now also increases your speechcraft by 20 for a duration of 90 seconds.
2/10/2013 - v1.1.2 - Slightly renamed the potions.
2/10/2013 - v1.1.1 - Reduced the damage magicka effect on Vintage Matze.
2/10/2013 - v1.1 - Added Vintage Flin, Vintage Greef, and Vintage Matze potions to Thadas\'s inventory. I\'ve also added a bit more clutter.
2/7/2013 - Initial Release


==================
[color=#beb887]Contact Details:[/color]
==================

If you run into any bugs or have any suggestions/comments, then either PM me here or leave them in the comments section.


==================
[color=#beb887]Credits:[/color]
==================

A big thanks to:
InsanitySorrow for his Morrowind Potions resource - http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1400-insanitys-morrowind-potions/.
And also for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.


==================
[color=#beb887]Translations:[/color]
==================

German translation of this mod can be found at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34176


==================
[color=#beb887]My Other Mods:[/color]
==================

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25528][img]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/25528-2-1350249669ac1s.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24933][img]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/24933-1-1349229183fwm2s.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24920][img]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/24920-1-1349206269sc1s.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28131][img]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/SnowboundAcres.jpg[/img][/url]
